game.name: The Dead Await
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 좀비가 창궐한 세상을 배경으로 한 덱 빌딩 RPG인 The Dead Await에서 덱을 만들고 생존을 시도하십시오. 많은 생존자들 중 한 명으로서, 황량한 세계를 가로지르고, 좀비 바이러스에 대한 진실을 발견하고, 인류 문명을 재건하세요 - 아니면 시도하다가 죽음을 맞이하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your deck and try to survive in The Dead Await, a deck-building RPG set during a zombie apocalypse. As one of many survivors, set out across the desolate world, discover the truth about the outbreak, and rebuild human civilization - or die trying.

reviewHighlights.text: Glad I bought it, definitely recommended. It's an original take on card combat and RPG. Open world is fun and interesting.
